    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    App
    App is the main class for the Apollo client application.
    App
     
    AuthClient
    AuthClient is a client-side class that interacts with the remote AuthService.
    AuthProvider
    Remote implementation of the AuthService interface.
    AuthProviderManager
    Manages user authentication, including login, registration, session validation, and logout.
    AuthService
    Remote interface for user authentication service using Java RMI.
    Block
    Represents a data block used for file storage and transfer.
    Command
    Command is an interface that defines the structure for all command classes.
    CommandFactory
    CommandFactory is responsible for creating command objects based on user input.
    CrypticEngine
    Utility class providing cryptographic hash functions for data verification.
    DAOFactory
    Factory interface to provide Data Access Objects (DAOs) for different entities.
    DBFileBlockDAO
    Implementation of FileBlockDAO that interacts with a SQL database to perform CRUD operations on file blocks.
    DBFileMetadataDAO
    Implementation of FileMetadataDAO to manage file metadata in a SQL database.
    DBSessionDAO
    Data Access Object (DAO) implementation for accessing and manipulating User records in the database.
    DBUserDAO
    Data Access Object (DAO) interface for managing user data.
    DeleteCommand
    DeleteCommand is responsible for handling the file deletion process.
    DownloadCommand
    DownloadCommand is responsible for handling the file download process.
    FileBlockDAO
    Data Access Object (DAO) interface for managing file blocks.
    FileClient
    FileClient is responsible for interacting with the remote FileService.
    FileMetadata
    Represents metadata information for a file owned by a user.
    FileMetadataDAO
    Data Access Object (DAO) interface for managing file metadata.
    FileProvider
    Remote implementation of the FileService interface for file operations.
    FileProviderManager
    Manages file metadata and blocks, coordinating storage operations and persistence.
    FileService
    Remote interface for a file service using Java RMI (Remote Method Invocation).
    ListFilesCommand
    ListFilesCommand is responsible for listing all files available on the remote service.
    LoginCommand
    LoginCommand is responsible for handling the login process.
    LogoutCommand
    LogoutCommand is responsible for handling the logout process.
    RegisterCommand
    RegisterCommand is responsible for handling the user registration process.
    Session
    Represents a user session in the system.
    SessionContext
    SessionContext represents the context of a user session.
    SessionDAO
    Data Access Object (DAO) interface for managing user sessions.
    SessionManager
    SessionManager is responsible for managing session data by saving and loading session tokens to and from files.
    SQLiteDAOFactory
    SQLite-specific implementation of the DAOFactory.
    UploadCommand
    UploadCommand is responsible for handling the file upload process.
    User
    Represents a user entity in the system.
    UserDAO
    Data Access Object (DAO) interface for user-related database operations.
